mainText:
It is with very deep sadness that I've learned of the passing of Steve 
Jobs.

My heart goes out to his family, as they grieve the loss of their loved 
one, a man we all loved and admired for so long.

There are no words to express the sadness I feel in seeing this creative 
genius and genuinely good person, leave us much to soon.

Rest in Peace Steve, you will be remembered and honored forever.
author: Sandy
